name: bitrise
title: Bitrise builds
description:
This extension shows a list of your latest bitrise builds. 

It requires a bitrise API key which you can get on https://app.bitrise.io/me/profile#/security
author: Sven Bendel

commands.name: index
commands.title: List bitrise builds
commands.subtitle: Shows a list of the latest bitrise builds
commands.description: Shows a list of the latest bitrise builds, including meta data. Allows quickly jumping to each build in the bitrise web UI.
